law.catch_line: Prohibition against affixing stamp to cigarettes of tobacco product manufacturer or brand family not in directory -- Prohibition against selling cigarettes after manufacturer or brand family removed from directory.
law.text:
It shall be unlawful for:
Any stamping agent, distributor, or any other person to affix a stamp to a package or other container of cigarettes of a tobacco product manufacturer or brand family not included in the directory; or
Any retailer or any other person to sell cigarettes from a tobacco product manufacturer or brand family after the effective date of the removal of the tobacco product manufacturer or brand family from the directory.
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 55, sec. 5, effective July 1, 2015. -- Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 3, effective July 1, 2009. -- Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 194, sec. 5, effective April 6, 2003.
